Class InternshipApplicationDbMgr

java.lang.Object
InternshipApplicationDbMgr
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class InternshipApplicationDbMgr extends Object implements Serializable
Manages a collection of InternshipApplication objects. Provides methods to add, retrieve, and remove applications.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    InternshipApplicationDbMgr()
    Creates a new manager with an empty list of internship applications.

    • get

      public InternshipApplication get(Internship internship)
      Retrieves an internship application based on the given internship.
      Parameters:
      internship - the internship whose application is requested
      Returns:
      the matching InternshipApplication, or null if not found

    • getAll

      public List<InternshipApplication> getAll()
      Returns all internship applications.
      Returns:
      the list of InternshipApplication objects

    • get

      public InternshipApplication get(int idx)
      Retrieves an internship application by its index in the list.
      Parameters:
      idx - the index of the application
      Returns:
      the InternshipApplication at the specified index

    • add

      public boolean add(InternshipApplication internshipApplication)
      Adds a new internship application if it does not already exist and the maximum allowed number of applications has not been reached.
      Parameters:
      internshipApplication - the application to add
      Returns:
      true if the application was successfully added, false otherwise

    • remove

      public boolean remove(InternshipApplication internshipApplication)
      Removes a matching internship application from the list.
      Parameters:
      internshipApplication - the application to remove
      Returns:
      true if the application was found and removed, false otherwise

    • contains

      public boolean contains(InternshipApplication internshipApplication)
      Checks whether the list contains an application matching both the internship and application status.
      Parameters:
      internshipApplication - the application to check
      Returns:
      true if a matching application exists, false otherwise

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Internship internship)
      Checks whether the list contains an application for the given internship.
      Parameters:
      internship - the internship to check
      Returns:
      true if an application exists for this internship, false otherwise
